channel.title: Golang on ShootBird
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on ShootBird

item.title: Getting Stuff Out of a Todo App Like Clear
item.description: Table of Contents 1. What’s Clear? 2. Explaining SQLite 3. Why write a program to get the data out? 4. Getting started 5. Checking your .sqlite file 6. Writing your Go program 6.1. Connect to the SQLite database 6.2. Get column headings from a table 6.3. Get column data types 6.4. Read data from the database 7. Postscript and the Why One frustration I’ve had with task list applications on iOS and macOS is that they tend to hide where they store the data you’ve saved on it.
